overview:
Neil Rosenbaum is a live events executive who has pioneered the way multi-purpose venues and technology create immersive attendee experiences.

Neil is a leading entertainment and sports business executive. As general manager of AV Concepts he has shaped the way event technology is used through holographic projection and complex projection mapping projects. His use of social media led company marketing efforts and branding initiatives. While production manager of the NHL Phoenix Coyotes, he led the procurement and installation of a new sound and lighting system, now an industry standard that increased the buildingâ€™s performance and saved arena tenants residual labor costs. As Production manager of the NBA Orlando Magic he managed the opening of the most technologically advanced multi-purpose venue ever built, including a digital signage network of 1,100 signs and a $22 million dollar broadcast technology suite. His background in venue construction, project management, technology administration and revenue growth are a testament to his innovative approach managing multi-purpose venues and events of all types.
